nodes.text: The Neo-Fundamentalist Phlangites, also known as the NFP, were a group led by the individual Zaglis that operated in the Fioer desert on the planet Zaraksander. During the Galactic Civil War, NFP kidnapped Cyrstas Eloinie, the daughter of the corporate executive Darred Eloinie, during the Peaceful Dawn Rally and held her hostage. The NFP demanded that Darred pay a ransom of 100,000 credits for her return, and Darred subsequently hired the bounty hunter Valken Gresh to go up against the group and rescue her.
